definition: background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

sentences.english: You just don't know but we have faith in our bosses and the people upstairs.
sentences.chinese: 你心里没底，但是我们对我们的老板和管理层有信心。

sentences.english: Sorry, my heart has no bottom.
But when he opens his mouth he laughs because he is afraid.
sentences.chinese: 但他一开口却笑了起来，他心里还是没底。

sentences.english: I have been unconfident in whether this matter can be accomplished.
sentences.chinese: 这件事情能不能办成，我心里一直没底。

sentences.english: My heart follows the wind that blows amain.
sentences.chinese: 我的心没底止的跟着风吹。

definition: to hesitate/to have second thoughts/to be concerned/to brood (over sth)/to complain
to be unsure about a matter/to be uncertain/to be unable to make sense of sth
to be clueless/to have no plan
in doubt/unsure of sth/unable to decide/indecisive
to be on tenterhooks (idiom)/to be anxious and frightened
variant of 發怵|发怵[fa1 chu4]
at sixes and sevens/perturbed state of mind/in a mess
to beat a drum/to play a drum/(fig.) to feel nervous
